abstract: In preparation for the final quarter and the new year, several advertising agencies have announced major business moves to bolster their sales.
snippet: In preparation for the final quarter and the new year, several advertising agencies have announced major business moves to bolster their sales.
lead_paragraph: 6:12 p.m. | Updated This is the time of year when advertising agencies begin to announce major business moves in anticipation of positioning themselves for growth through the important fourth quarter and into the new year.

headline.main: Ad Agencies Gear Up for Fourth Quarter
